experience.title: Secretary Dramatics Cup
experience.description: - Handled logistics, organised workshops, practice sessions, steering committee meetings to efficiently manage all 5 events of the Dramatics Cup as part of General Championship, Social and Cultural.- Represented the Dramatics Cup budget in Nehru Hall's GBM 2017-18 and managed a budget of INR 2,50,000.- Introduced generic costumes and make-up kits and created a set management system to help reduce the amount spent on sets, thereby curtailing the budget by a massive 20%.

projects: [{"title":"Chess Board Detection","start_date":"Sep 2018","end_date":"Nov 2018","description":"Built an algorithm that is capable of recognizing the chess board and locate the squares anddetect chess pieces from an image for the prediction of best move."},{},{"title":"Android Application - Fingerprint based Attendance System","start_date":"May 2018","end_date":"Jun 2018","description":"Supervisor: Prof. Avishek Chatterjee, Department of Electrical Engineering, IIT Kharagpur- Created an Android Mobile Application for large classroom attendance system with a commercial fingerprint scanner- Featured1-N matching on Android Studio along with content management system to store and retrieve all the fingerprints registered- Designed the app screen to enhance user experience and composed user manual including references for possible future developments- Secured the application to avoid any re-registration of the fingerprint for unique roll number without authorized permission"},{"title":"Drishti, Hardware Modelling","start_date":"Mar 2018","end_date":"Apr 2018","description":"- Designed a compact, lightweight and highly portable device, specially made to cater to the needs of the visually impaired people- Designed a sensor based obstacle circuit and user-friendly audio output system for blind people to recognise the type of obstacle in front"}]

honors_and_awards.description: - Performed feature engineering by creating new features such as day_of_week, hour_bucket etc. which are relevant to network congestion - Visualized the data interactively using Tableau to get an idea on the dependance of various features on the cell tower congestion - Performed exploratory analysis by plotting correlation matrix to ensure no overlap of new features & feature importance plot for features selection - Implemented binary and multiclass classifications to predictâ¦ Show more
